# init()

**Initializer**

Creates a new instance for storing descriptive information about an activity.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Discussion

After you create a new [doc://com.apple.GroupActivities/documentation/GroupActivities/GroupActivityMetadata] structure, assign values to its properties and deliver it to the system from the [doc://com.apple.GroupActivities/documentation/GroupActivities/GroupActivity/metadata] property of your custom [doc://com.apple.GroupActivities/documentation/GroupActivities/GroupActivity] type.
title: init()
